oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb ʻAjāyib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāyib al-mawjūdāt : manuscript, [circa 1650-1700]
ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt
ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Qazwīnī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad , approximately 1203-1283
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 253 paintings with text; ink, opaque watercolor and gold on paper, with modern binding.
Folio: 30.1 x 17.2 cm (11 7/8 x 6 3/4 in.); text area, irregular: 20.8 x 10.9 cm (8 3/16 x 4 5/16 in.).
Harvard Art Museum/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Philip Hofer in memory of Eric Schroeder, 1972.3, Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass.
